price: 187. Ee nagu soo rid gabal samada ah haddaad run sheegi.
arabic: فَأَسۡقِطۡ عَلَيۡنَا كِسَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-asqiṭ ʿalaynā kisafan mina al-samāi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
